category.name: Hello
category.message: I look forward to flying with you.

category.name: Bye
category.message: I only have a few minutes.

category.name: Be Right Back
category.message: I'll be back in two shakes of a dragon's tail!

category.name: Friendly
category.message: Pots and kettles! You're my best friend!

category.name: Happy
category.message: I feel as light as dandelion fluff!
I feel fit as a fiddlehead fern!

category.name: Sad
category.message: Just let it roll off your wings.

category.name: Mad
category.message: Hey, fly under the speed limit!
Wherever I turn, you're always underwing.

category.name: Silly
category.message: I'm as hungry as a caterpillar!
I wonder what will turnip next!
You're as pretty as a petunia!
Tinkering is a way of life.
Oh my pots and kettles -- you're flitterific!

category.name: Wait
category.message: Sorry, I couldn't wait any longer.

category.name: Sorry
category.message: I'd fly backwards if I could.
Don't get your wings in a tangle.
Sorry, I'm busy on a quest!
Sorry, I can't go to a party right now.

category.name: Do you like ...
category.message: Do you like my Fairy name?
Do you like my Animal Friend?

category.name: Do you want ...
category.message: Do you want to be friends?
Do you want to gather with me?
Do you want to shop with me?
Do you want to play a game?
Do you want to see a play?
Do you want to have tea?

category.name: Watch...
category.message: Watch my Animal Friend fly backwards!
Watch my Animal Friend fly in a circle!
Watch my Animal Friend do a flip!
Watch my Animal Friend make friends!
Watch my Animal Friend double flip!

category.name: Gifts
category.message: How do the Animal Friends bring gifts?
Their Hunger, Health and Mood must be above 90.
The Animal Friend must be following you.
Animal Friends bring 2 gifts a day!
How did your Animal Friend get that outfit?
Animal outfits come in Gold gift boxes!
I love the gift my Animal Friend brought me!
My Animal Friend brought me ingredients!
My Animal Friend brought me Silly Sweets!
My Animal Friend brought me dye!
The Animal Friends have funny outfits!
My Butterfly brought me a Seed Pack!
My Butterfly brought me Pixie Diamonds!

category.name: More
category.message: Visit Beck to choose an Animal Friend.
Click on your Animal Friend to check on it.
Visit Elixa to cure your Animal Friend.
Visit Elixa to let your Animal Friend go.
I like your Animal Friend's name.

category.name: Fairy Gardens
category.message: Get Surprise Seeds at Garden Supply!
You don't have to wait with Insta-Bloom!
Will you please sing to my plants?
I can get a bonus if my friends sing!
Thanks for singing to my plants!
I can't wait to see what grows!
Look at what grew in my Fairy Garden!

category.name: Pixie Diamonds
category.message: I got it with Pixie Diamonds!
How do you get Pixie Diamonds?
Click the Wallet to get Pixie Diamonds!
Did you get that with Pixie Diamonds?
I just got some Pixie Diamonds!

category.name: Pixie Post Office
category.message: The Pixie Post Office is open!
Fly to the Pixie Post Office!
Meet me at the Pixie Post Office!
You can send gifts to friends!
Have you sent a gift yet?
Have you sent a postcard yet?
My friend sent me a gift!
My friend sent me a postcard!
Thank you for the gift you sent me!
I've sent postcards to my friends!
I've sent gifts to my friends!

category.name: Queen's Boutique
category.message: The Queen's Boutique is in Havendish!
Let's shop at the Queen's Boutique!
I've never seen anything so gorgeous!
Get that gown while you can!
There are only a few like that left!
This flitterific style will go fast!
You look just like royalty in your gown!

category.name: Baking
category.message: Dulcie's Kitchen is in Neverberry Thicket.
This is my first time baking.
Baking is a piece of cake!
Let's bake some treats in Dulcie's Kitchen.
I've got new recipes to bake!

category.name: Fairy Coliseum
category.message: Fly with me to the Fairy Coliseum!
Let's fly to Zephyr's Zoom Room!
Zephyr's has the best racing gear!
I made it onto the Leaderboard!
Who wants to race baby animals?

category.name: Fairy Tale Theater
category.message: Let's see a play at Fairy Tale Theater.
Let's perform at Fairy Tale Theater.
What play is running in the theater?
You should get a costume for the play.
This is a costume from a play.
We are having a dress rehearsal.
I'll be in charge of props.
Would you like a cookie before the show?
Dulcie's treats make any play better!

category.name: Fairy Tale Theater: Play...
category.message: Let's perform Fairy Mary's Day Off.
Wow! The stage looks like a beach.
I wish I could have a day off.
The Case of the Missing Sparkles!
Let's perform Case of the Missing Sparkles.
I'll be the Minister of Autumn.
The Quest for the Purple Gem!
Let's perform Quest for the Purple Gem.
Sand dunes can't talk... can they??
I know where the Purple Gem is!
Bad Day To Be a Pirate!
I'm not afraid of Captain Hook!
Those pirates will never find Pixie Hollow.
I love playing tricks on pirates.
I want to be one of the fairies.

category.name: Flying Around
category.message: Can you fly to my home?
Click on me and select Fly To from my profile.

category.name: Gathering
category.message: Everyone click the Bunch when I say "Go!"
Wait for more Fairies before we click!
This isn't what I'm looking for.
Quick! Grab some of that Bunch!
Click the Bunch and we can share.
Come on everyone, gather this one!
Gathering Bunches is a team sport!

category.name: Home and Party
category.message: Have you seen my new home?
My home is so big now!
Get a new home at Neville's!
Why don't you host a party?
Let's go to a public party!

category.name: Honors and Badges
category.message: I love your Founding Fairy necklace.
Wow! You have a lot of badges.
I just earned a new badge!
We have the same favorite badge.
I wish there was a badge for just being me.
Your member pin has lots of jewels!
I reached the next level of Talent Mastery.

category.name: Let's ...
category.message: Let's sit and chat for a while.

category.name: News and Postings
category.message: Did you read the Never News?
Did you see the Events Blog?
I was featured in the Events Blog.
Did you read the Pixie Postings?
I love this week's Pixie Postings!
I was featured in the Pixie Postings.
Did you see Tabby post her Tell-All?
The public party list is in the Pixie Postings.

category.name: Quests
category.message: Help out in the Hollow by questing!
This is my first time questing.
Where can I get a quest?

category.name: Shopping
category.message: I'm looking for a new outfit.
I'm looking for new home items.
I'm looking for some nice dye colors.
I'm thinking of getting my hair done.
I'm picking up some party decorations!
I'm picking out some party games!
I am buying a bigger house!
Wow! Your new hairstyle looks great!

category.name: Tailoring
category.message: Let's tailor at Bobbin's Tailoring Nook.
Let's tailor at Mendy's Tailoring Nook.
I'm tailoring at Bobbin's Tailoring Nook.
I'm tailoring at Mendy's Tailoring Nook.
Bobbin's Nook is in Springtime Orchard.
Mendy's Nook is in Maple Tree Hill.
I need to earn more patterns.
I love the new patterns for tailoring!
I'm working on my Tailoring Badges.
You can make clothes at Bobbin's.
You can make accessories at Mendy's.
I should tailor myself something new.

category.name: Talent Masters
category.message: Visit the Pixie Dust Mill to see Terence.
Terence gave me a new pixie dust cup!
I need to earn more Talent Points.
I just unlocked a new talent skill!
Let's use our talent skills in the meadow.
I'm on my way to becoming a Talent Master!

category.name: Tearoom and Ballroom
category.message: Shall we sit and have some tea?
If we sit down at the table, tea will appear.
Can I pour you some tea?
Tea between talent games is just flitterific!
What is your favorite type of tea?
What type of tea shall I pour for you?
Do you want to play Crazy Cakes?
Do you want to play Two for Tea?
Click on a table to join a game.
What is the card color right now?
Where is the card I need???
Two for Tea in the Tearoom is fun!
Let's play Two for Tea in the Tearoom.
The Ballroom is always open to Members!

category.name: Tinkering
category.message: Let's tinker at Copper's Tinkering Nook!
I'm tinkering at Copper's Tinkering Nook.
The Tinkering Nook is in Maple Tree Hill.
I need to earn more blueprints.
I'm working on my Tinkering Badges.
I love it when a blueprint comes together!
I've got new blueprints to tinker!
I should tinker some new furniture.

category.name: Wilderness
category.message: This is my first time in the Wilderness.
I need to eat a dessert!
The Silver Trees are in Pumpkin Patch.
The Bubbly Bog is in Dewdrop Vale.
The Never Mine is in Chilly Falls.
Eat a dessert to refill your pixie dust!
You need to click on them.
Click and shake it with your mouse.
Click and drag them with your mouse.
You need to roll over them with your mouse.
I don't understand what to do for this game.
I need help finishing this game.

category.name: More
category.message: Come on, it's time to flit!
Flap those wings and let's go!
Last one there is a gooseberry!
You're as great as laughs and giggles.
You're as fluttery as a butterfly today.
You're as pretty as a posy.
You're as sweet as strawberry pie!
You're cute as a baby bird!
You're looking pretty as a rainbow!

category.name: Art Month
category.message: Art-talent Bess is my pixie hero!
I got a new hairdo at Schelly's Salon!
I dyed my hair crazy colors!
I decorated my Fairy Home for Art Month!
My outfit is in honor of Art Month!

category.name: Sweet Week
category.message: Leave a tray of cookies in your home!
I got a Heart Trail Silly Sweet!
I tinkered a Cute as a Cupcake Vanity!
You can tinker your own at Copper's!

category.name: Fairy Friendship Festival
category.message: Will you be my pixie pal?!
You are my best Fairy friend forever.
You're like a sister to me!
Have you done Tink's new quest?
Go see Tink to get a quest!
Tink needs help with a gift for Peri!
How do I get the friendship badge?
Put on your Heart Accessory Set!
Did your Animal Friend bring you a gift?
My animal and I are both wearing hearts!

category.name: Spring Celebration Prep
category.message: I can't wait for spring to come!
I am helping Rosetta plant seeds!
I got a seed packet for helping Rosetta!
Have you helped Rosetta with her quest?
I hope we can plant enough seeds!

category.name: Clover Chaos
category.message: I am helping Fawn find the baby animals!
Have you seen the missing baby animals?
I got a badge for helping Fawn!
There's so much clover in the meadows!
We must have planted a lot of seeds!
It's clover chaos in the Hollow!
Have you seen the new Silly Sweet?
Rainbow Trail Silly Sweets at Dulcie's!

category.name: Flood
category.message: Oh no! The spring meadows are flooded!
Try not to get your wings wet!
Fly to Iridessa for a new quest!
I helped Dessa make sunbeams for spring!
I got my umbrella from the Ballroom!
The Everblossom's safe in the Ballroom!

category.name: Spring Celebration
category.message: We made spring bright for everyone!
I'm glad the sun's out again!
Did you find all 10 golden clovers?
I found all of the golden clovers!
Golden clovers are in spring meadows!
A golden clover's hidden right here!
Get your rainbow seeds in the Ballroom!

category.name: Never Dove Egg Hunt
category.message: It's the Never Dove Egg Hunt!
Did you find all 15 Never Dove Eggs?
I got a badge for finding all 15 Eggs!
Help me look for Never Dove Eggs!
I can't find all the Never Dove Eggs.
I saw an egg over here, follow me!
There are eggs in the Tearoom!
There are eggs in the Ballroom!
There are eggs in the Theater!
There are eggs in the Fairy Coliseum!
The Golden Egg is in the Ballroom!
Good luck with the egg hunt!
Check out the real egg in the Ballroom!
Aww, the chickie is so cute!
I am helping Fawn with a mystery!
Fawn gave me a fancy egg purse!
Wanna have an egg hunt at my Fairy Home?

category.name: Silly Days
category.message: Silly Days are so funny, I love jokes!
I just watched a comedy show!
Put on your Wacky Rainbow Wig!
Have you done Silvermist's new quest?
I got the key to Mermaid Grotto!
Have you been to Mermaid Grotto?
Have you heard the mermaids giggling?
Get the Lobster Suit in Mermaid Grotto!
There is some silly stuff at Cassie's!

category.name: Mermaid Party
category.message: The Mermaid Party is a dream come true!
Have you done Silvermist's new quest?
I got the key to Mermaid Grotto!
Get to the Grotto from Palm Tree Cove!
Get seashell furniture in the Grotto!
See Kit for a Nature Days quest!
Think of ways you can save water!

category.name: Nature Days
category.message: Kit has a paw-some new mainland quest!
Have you gotten the new badge from Kit?
I made a list of ways I can help nature!
The Never News has more ways to help.
Enter the Fairy Art for Nature Contest!
A seed will be planted for every entry!

category.name: Animal Mother's Day
category.message: The animal mothers need a break!
Have you gone on Rosetta's quest yet?
Yes! I got my Animal Mother's Day badge!
Let's visit all of the baby animals.
I love taking care of the baby animals.
Buy the Stars Are Out Cap at Cassie's!
Play with the kitten in Sunflower Gully!
Aww! The kitten is soo cute!
Where'd you get that kitten hat?
Get a Kitten Knit Hat in the Ballroom!

category.name: Garden Tea Party
category.message: Welcome to the Garden Tea Party!
Would you care for some tea?
I got my Teatime Treat badge!
I got my At Your Service badge!
I got my Tip Top Tea Brewer badge!
I'm helping Fawn find the white rabbit!
I got this flitterific scepter from Fawn!
I'm a baking-talent, just like Dulcie!
Where did you get a Magic Tea Cake?
I got a Magic Tea Cake at Harmony's!
I got a Magic Tea Cake in the Ballroom!
Where did you get a Magic Tea Drink?
I got a Magic Tea Drink at Harmony's!
I got a Magic Tea Drink in the Ballroom!
Where did you get your fancy outfit?
I got my fancy outfit at Cassie's!
Where do I get the tea party hats?
Get the tea party hats at Cassie's!

category.name: Summer Equinox
category.message: The Minister of Summer is here!
Clap for the Minister of Summer!

category.name: Farewell Pixie Hollow
category.message: Thanks for being my fairy friend!
I'm going to miss Pixie Hollow!
Don't forget to print your outfits!
Did you get the badge in the Ballroom?
All fairies can go to the Ballroom now!

category.name: Camp Pixie Dust
category.message: I signed up for Camp Pixie Dust!
Sign up for camp in Havendish!
Which Camp Troop are you in?
Yay! We're in the same troop!
Everybody eat the Fireworks Silly Sweet!
Sign up for camp to help your troop!
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!
Let's see Lyria at Fairy Tale Theater!
I'm working on an epic Fawn quest!
I'm working on an epic Rosetta quest!
I'm working on an epic Tink quest!
I'm working on an epic Silvermist quest!
I'm working on an epic Iridessa quest!
Have you found the Never Unicorn?
Where'd you get your bunny slippers?
I made a butterfly mosaic at Copper's!
I put my mosaic in my Fairy Garden!
Where'd you get your messenger bag?
I made a Turtle Satchel at Bobbin's!
Where'd you get your Otter Hat?
Make a Furry Knit Otter Hat at Bobbin's!
I made Glowworm Lights at Copper's!

category.name: Wilderness Explorer Weeks
category.message: Help your troop save the squirrels!
I got my Wilderness Explorer badge!
How do I get the Wilderness Explorer badge?
Go help 5 squirrels in the Wilderness!
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!

category.name: Flower Power Weeks
category.message: Plant seeds to help your troop!
I got my Flower Power badge!
How'd you get your Flower Power badge?
Grow 5 1-day seeds in your Fairy Garden!
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!

category.name: Summer Splash Party
category.message: Follow me to the Lucky Fish!

category.name: Pixie Party Weeks
category.message: Throw a Summer Party to help your troop!
I got my Pixie Party badge!
How'd you get your Pixie Party badge?
Where do I get a Summer Party?
Look for a Summer Party at Phoebe's!
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!
I love the Pixie Party dresses at Gale's!

category.name: Camp Craft Weeks
category.message: Practice tinkering to help your troop!
I got my Creative Crafting badge!
How'd you get your Creative Crafting badge?
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!

category.name: The Never Unicorn
category.message: Find the Never Unicorn to help your troop!
I got my Never Unicorn Seeker badge!
How do I get the Never Unicorn badge?
Go see Iridessa in Sunflower Gully!
Hope my troop wins the Challenge!

category.name: End-of-Summer Sparkler
category.message: The darkened meadows are so pretty!
You light up my life, pixie pal!
Where do I get a Neverlight Party?
Look for a Neverlight Party at Phoebe's!
I got the End-of-Summer Sparkler badge!
Can you believe summer is almost over?
We made flaptastic memories at camp!

category.name: Troop Rabbit
category.message: Show off your Troop Rabbit spirit!
Twitch your nose and flap your paw!
We're the Rabbits, rah rah rah!
All of the troops are critterific!
How do I show Troop Rabbit spirit?
First you have to go to Maple Tree Hill!
Show the rabbit emote with 4 pixies!

category.name: Troop Butterfly
category.message: Show off your Troop Butterfly spirit!
Raise your spirits, I'll tell you why!
Cause we're the troop of the butterfly!
All of the troops are plant-tastic!
How do I show Troop Butterfly spirit?
First you have to go to Cherryblossom!
Show the butterfly emote with 4 pixies!

category.name: Troop Otter
category.message: Show off your Troop Otter spirit!
Make a splash, give a holler!
Show off your pride for Troop Otter!
All of the troops are splashtastic!
How do I show Troop Otter spirit?
First you have to go to Dewdrop Vale!
Show the otter emote with 4 pixies!

category.name: Troop Turtle
category.message: Show off your Troop Turtle spirit!
Clap your hands and stomp your feet!
Cause turtle spirit can't be beat!
Turtles always carry a reminder of home!
All of the troops are tinkertastic!
How do I show Troop Turtle spirit?
First you have to go to Cottonpuff!
Show the turtle emote with 4 pixies!

category.name: Troop Glowworm
category.message: Show off your Troop Glowworm spirit!
Show your spirit, shout out loud!
We're the glowworms and we're proud!
All of the troops are shimmerific!
How do I show Troop Glowworm Spirit?
First you have to go to Sunflower Gully!
Show the glowworm emote with 4 pixies!

category.name: Changing of the Leaves
category.message: Think we can paint all these leaves in time?
Let's paint those leaves orange and red!

category.name: Autumn Equinox
category.message: The leaf-painting pixies did a good job!
I love when the leaves change color!
The Golden Acorn Hunt has begun!
Look for acorns in the autumn meadows!
I love your new autumn outfit!
I look like the Minister of Autumn!
You look as pretty as an autumn leaf!
I want a golden acorn necklace, too!
I got my acorn necklace in the Ballroom!
I dyed my outfit autumn colors!

category.name: Animal Masquerade
category.message: Visit Fawn for a fun and spooky quest!
Fly to Fairy Tale Theater, if you dare!
The animals made a Haunted Dollhouse!
Want to go trick or treating?
How do I trick or treat?
Get a Trick or Treat Basket at Cassie's!
Say "Trick or Treat!" near the pumpkins!
I got the Animal Masquerade badge!
Trick or Treat at all 12 spots for a badge!
I got all 12 trick or treat prizes!

category.name: Chilly Critter Crossing
category.message: Help Tink with the animal crossing!
Go see Tinker Bell for a quest!
Tink gave me the Chilly Traveler badge!
Did you get the Chilly Traveler badge?
Where are the snow animals crossing to?
Animals go deep into the Winter Woods!
That weasel just doesn't want to cross!

category.name: Sister Celebration
category.message: I know the secret of the wings!
Psst... want to hear a secret?
Tinker Bell and Periwinkle are sisters!
How do I get to the Frosted Forest?
Enter the Forest in Evergreen Overlook!
You need the Chilly Traveler badge!
It's snowing in the Frosted Forest!
Have you earned the Sister badge?
Read the signpost about the badge!
Put on your Sparkly Wings Necklace!
Ready, set, use the Sparkle Wings Emote!
Yay! I got the Sister badge!
You look just like a Frost Fairy!
I love the color of your wings!
My Fairy Home is totally iced over!

category.name: Fairy Feast
category.message: Go see Iridessa for a new quest!
Bright Eyes has a mystery for us!
I know who sent Iridessa the invite!
Did you get the Fairy Feast badge?
Finish Iridessa's quest to get a badge!
I'm cooking in Fairy Tale Theater!
Want to decorate the cake in Cottonpuff?
Decorate the cake to get a badge!
Want to make soup in Acorn Summit?
Make some soup to get a badge!
There's a cornucopia in Pumpkin Patch!
Pick up a festive gift in the Ballroom!
Come to my Fairy Feast party!
There's plenty of food for everyone!

category.name: Great Winter Light-Up
category.message: Sil said we can help the Winter Fairies!
Visit Silvermist for a new quest!
Help Sil to get the Ice Palace Key!
You'll need the Ice Palace Key later!
Brrr! The Winter Woods are cold!
Whistle a winter tune while you work!

category.name: Winter Wonderland
category.message: We did it! Winter is here!
Want to go to the Minister's Ice Palace?
Meet me at the Ice Palace!
How do I get to the Ice Palace?
The Ice Palace is in Chilly Falls!
You need the Ice Palace Key badge!
Help Sil to get the Ice Palace Key!
Flap your wings for the Frost Fairies!
Have you seen the snow weasel?
Let's throw snowballs in the Ballroom!
I'm cooking in Fairy Tale Theater!
Holiday party in my Fairy Home!

category.name: Members
category.message: Where did you get that pin on your profile?
I earned the pin for being a member.

category.name: More
category.message: You should ask the Never Council.
Use the compass to open the map!
Use my profile to see my Pixie Page.
The question mark button is a tutorial.
